flavorText: Some emeritus professors return from their wanderings periodically to share tales of the mystical wonders of Arcavios.

foreignData.flavorText: Einige emeritierte Professoren kehren regelmäßig von ihren Reisen zurück, um Geschichten von den mystischen Wundern von Arcavios zu erzählen.
foreignData.name: Erzmagus-Emeritus
foreignData.text: Magiefertigkeit — Immer wenn du einen Spontanzauber oder eine Hexerei wirkst oder kopierst, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: Ciertos profesores eméritos regresan de sus viajes de vez en cuando para compartir historias sobre las maravillas místicas de Arcavios.
foreignData.name: Archimago emérito
foreignData.text: Hechicería — Siempre que lances o copies un hechizo de instantáneo o de conjuro, roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Certains professeurs émérites reviennent périodiquement de leurs voyages pour partager des récits concernant les merveilles mystiques d'Arcavios.
foreignData.name: Archimage émérite
foreignData.text: Sorcellerie — À chaque fois que vous lancez ou copiez un sort d'éphémère ou de rituel, piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: Alcuni professori emeriti tornano periodicamente dai loro viaggi per raccontare delle meraviglie mistiche di Arcavios.
foreignData.name: Arcimago Emerito
foreignData.text: Artemagica — Ogniqualvolta lanci o copi una magia istantaneo o stregoneria, pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: Некоторые заслуженные профессора время от времени возвращаются из своих странствий, чтобы поделиться рассказами о таинственных чудесах Аркавиоса.
foreignData.name: Заслуженный Архимаг
foreignData.text: Чародейство — Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете или копируете мгновенное заклинание или заклинание волшебства, возьмите карту.

name: Archmage Emeritus
originalText: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.

rulings.text: Each magecraft ability has a different effect, although they all have the same trigger condition, whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell.
For example, if you control Archmage Emeritus and cast an instant or sorcery spell, Archmage Emeritus’s magecraft ability will trigger and you will draw a card.
If an effect creates a copy of an instant or sorcery spell, this will also cause the magecraft ability to trigger.
If an effect creates multiple copies of an instant or sorcery spell, magecraft abilities trigger once for each copy created by the effect.

Some effects instruct you to copy an instant or sorcery card in a zone other than the stack. These copies do not cause magecraft abilities to trigger. However, most effects that do this also allow you to cast the copy, and casting the copy will cause magecraft abilities to trigger.

text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.
